message: Take it or leave it, Bob. You get 1 dollar, or you get nothing!
Split it down the middle, Alice. Fair's fair!
Bob, I'm willing to give you 100000, but I'm not going to give you any more. You get 100000 or you get nothing. Think about it!
Come on, Alice, be reasonable. Meet me in the middle again!
Bob, I'm willing to give you a little more, but I'm not going to give you any more than 50000. You get 50000 or you get nothing. Time is running out!
I'm not going to give up, Alice. I'll take 7/10 of the pot, and we can call it a day.
